page.title: 19 KIDSGROVE POLICE INTERVIEW
page.content: Two policemen P.C.Nixon and P.C.Holdcroft came to school. They told us about Kidsgrove police station. They have 2 men in the cells at the moment, the highest number they can have is 6. The new station is about 10 years old, the old station was built over 100 years ago. They told us that police could not use weapons without permission. Only one group from over 40 offices at kidsgrove is trained to use them. The police have one IRV car,one van, 4 cars and 2 4 wheel drive Range Rovers. They have one dog, the handler is named P.C.Finney.The police have arrested about 600 people this year. Their area goes from Scholar Green to Goldenhill and Mow Cop to Talke. BY GORDON HASSALL, AGED 11 YEARS
